autumn.util.test

Interface TestResults

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<TestResult>

    public interface TestResults
extends java.lang.Iterable<TestResult>
    An instance of this interface contains the results of zero-or-more unit-tests.

    Caution: This interface may have additional methods added in the future.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long executionTime()
      This method retrieves the total amount of time that the test-cases spent executing.
      boolean failed()
      This method determines whether any of the test-cases failed.
      TestResult find(java.lang.String name)
      This method searches for a specific test-result given the its name.
      java.util.Iterator<TestResult> iterator()
      This method creates an iterator that iterates over the results herein.
      boolean passed()
      This method determines whether all of the test-cases passed.
      void print(java.io.PrintStream out)
      This method prints a hopefully human readable description of these test results.
      java.util.List<TestResult> results()
      This method converts this object to a list.

    • Method Detail

      • passed

        boolean passed()
        This method determines whether all of the test-cases passed.
        Returns:
        true, iff all of the test-cases passed.

      • failed

        boolean failed()
        This method determines whether any of the test-cases failed.
        Returns:
        true, iff any of the test-cases failed.

      • executionTime

        long executionTime()
        This method retrieves the total amount of time that the test-cases spent executing.
        Returns:
        the total number of milliseconds that the tests spent executing.

      • print

        void print(java.io.PrintStream out)
        This method prints a hopefully human readable description of these test results.
        Parameters:
        out - is the output-stream to print to.

      • find

        TestResult find(java.lang.String name)
        This method searches for a specific test-result given the its name.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the test-case.
        Returns:
        the test-result.
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the name is not the name of any of the test-cases.

      • results

        java.util.List<TestResult> results()
        This method converts this object to a list.
        Returns:
        an immutable list containing the individual test results.

      • iterator

        java.util.Iterator<TestResult> iterator()
        This method creates an iterator that iterates over the results herein.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<TestResult>
        Returns:
        an iterator over the results().
